job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Title: Data Scientist (Machine Learning, AWS, Python)<br>Location: San Francisco CA<br>Contract Duration: 12 Months<br><br>Candidates must have experience in Machine Learning (Client), NLP, Computer Vision (CV), transformer, good coding skills. 9+ years exp.<br><br>Job Description:<br><br>Experience with production-level Deep Learning models in Computer Vision and NLP.<br>Expertise in software development with Python (including Object-Oriented design, Python packaging, and unit testing).<br>Experience with PySpark.<br>Familiarity with distributed model training frameworks like Horovod and Petastorm (although this can be learned).<br>Familiarity with MLOps frameworks like MLflow.<br>Familiarity with SQL.<br>Some familiarity with AWS Lambda, AWS SageMaker, Jenkins, and Databricks.<br>Familiarity with Git.
